thread.title: ACLU wants court to block NSA's ongoing phone records collection

title: ACLU wants court to block NSA's ongoing phone records collection
text:
03 ACLU wants court to block NSA's ongoing phone records collection 
Computerworld: The American Civil Liberties Union is taking the NSA back to court over its continued bulk collection of phone metadata records.Although the law the NSA was using to justify its collection of phone records lapsed on June 1, Congress gave it 180 days to transition to a newer, more narrowly defined process of collecting information.
